select-by-config.name: thirdparty.prime.sscs_4_32
select-by-config.caption: PRIME IEC 61334-4-32 Convergence Layer
select-by-config.info: The 4-32 SSCS provides convergence functions for applications that use IEC 61334-4-32 services. Additionally, the PRIME 4-32 SSCS provides extra services that help map this connection-less protocol to the connection-oriented nature of PRIME MAC.

module.caption: PRIME IEC 61334-4-32 Convergence Layer
module.info: The 4-32 SSCS provides convergence functions for applications that use IEC 61334-4-32 services. Additionally, the PRIME 4-32 SSCS provides extra services that help map this connection-less protocol to the connection-oriented nature of PRIME MAC.
